General.Name: Tianshan Aluminum Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianshan Aluminum Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of aluminum deep-processed products and materials, prebaked anodes, high-purity aluminum, bauxite, and alumina. It sells self-produced and purchased aluminum ingots that are used as raw materials for downstream aluminum processing; electrolytic aluminum products which are used in construction, transportation, electric power, packaging, and household appliances, as well as rail transit, new energy vehicles, photovoltaic power plants, and wind power equipment; high-purity aluminum products that are used to manufacture electronic products, electronic components, high and low voltage electrolytic capacitors, high-performance wires, sapphire raw materials, integrated circuits, etc.; and aluminum plates, aluminum strips, and aluminum foils. Tianshan Aluminum Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shihezi, China.
